articles.description: The 30-year-old Irish actor dedicated his win to his late mother, who was a heroin addict, and to his son, Brando, after he took home the BAFTA for Best Supporting Actor last night in London.
articles.content: As he whizzed through his acceptance speech at the BAFTAs last night, post-it in hand, Barry Keoghan subtly acknowledged the hurt and adversity he overcame on his way to becoming one of the acting wo… [+10210 chars]

articles.author: Bethany Minelle
articles.title: BAFTA Film Awards 2023: All the best bits from the star-studded ceremony - and a mix-up you won't have seen on TV - Sky News
articles.content:
It's a night to celebrate the best films, actors and filmmakers of the past year, and 2023's BAFTA Film Awards gave us a revamped ceremony, not one but two-hosts, and a brand-new venue.
